channel.title: How to communicate with a roidhead
channel.description:
Lesson #1: Speak using your body language, smash a signpost if you are outside for example, be creative and find new things to smash. While smashing we suggest you make noises similar to "YEEEEEAH FUUUUUUUCK" and flex your roid-infested muscles.
Keep goin' people

like this:

item.title: How to communicate with a roidhead
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

<Cowie`> Lesson number 2: When attempting to pick up “broads”, tense frantically and assert your male dominance by showing your ability to pound and smash on others of a much smaller size. It is advised that whilst doing this you make noises similar to that of a killer whale.

Please do not forget people, important terms are vital in the lessons we will be continuing. Terms such as pecs and ceps are advised but we will accept terms ending with tastic, smash and FUK YEH as these are supported by roidheads.

Read full topic
